description: Bisulfite-Seq data for 2 CD3-positive, CD4-positive, CD8-positive, double positive thymocyte sample(s). 29 run(s), 2 experiment(s), 4 analysis(s) on human genome GRCh38. Part of BLUEPRINT release August 2016. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20160816/homo_sapiens/README_bisulphite_analysis_CNAG_20160816
